abstract: Facebook is enhancing its search functions in an effort to provide a better snapshot of what people are doing and thinking right now.
snippet: Facebook is enhancing its search functions in an effort to provide a better snapshot of what people are doing and thinking right now.
lead_paragraph: Though Facebook has topped 250 million members, the social network can still seem quite small. That’s usually an asset. But with interesting groups, useful applications and less current observations from friends and strangers buried on the site and easy to miss, it also limits the site’s utility as a reservoir of online insight.

headline.main: Facebook’s Search Toolbar Gets More Muscle
